definition: (military) the act of pulling back (especially an orderly withdrawal of troops)
details:
noun
- (military) the act of pulling back (especially an orderly withdrawal of troops)
= example: (military) the act of pulling back (especially an orderly withdrawal of troops)
- a device (as a decorative loop of cord or fabric) for holding or drawing something back
= example: a device (as a decorative loop of cord or fabric) for holding or drawing something back
= synonyms: tieback
